long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wield the power of the Infinity Gauntlet with the mighty Thanos-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A cosmic and imposing interface inspired by Thanos’ relentless quest for balance and ultimate power.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the grandeur and inevitability of Thanos’ presence.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Thanos-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as formidable and inevitable as the Mad Titan himself.
